titleStmt.title: Roger the Caterburian that cannot say grace for his meat, with a low-crown'd hat before his face, or, The character of a prelaticall man affecting heighths newly written by G. T.
titleStmt.author: G. T.
Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

notesStmt.note: Sometimes wrongly ascribed to John Taylor -- cf. Robert B. Daw, "The life and times of John Taylor, the water poet."
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
